sense.gloss: long-established shop, shop of long standing, old shop

sdata.j: この↑街↑↓まち↓にはどこか↑他↑↓ほか↓にも|↑老舗|↑↓しにせ↓のパン↑屋↑↓や↓さんはありませんか？
sdata.e: Isn't there an old bakery somewhere in this town?

sdata.j: トムは|↑老舗|↑↓しにせ↓↑旅館↑↓りょかん↓の↑跡取↑↓あとと↓り↑息子↑↓むすこ↓だよ。
sdata.e: Tom is the son and heir to the traditional Japanese inn.

sdata.e: Tom is the heir to the Japanese ryokan.
